
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18758846" title="发布于 2025-03-08 01:38">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架2025年2月简报</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250308013433223-303268467.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>公众号每月定期推广和分享的C#/.NET/.NET Core优秀项目和框架（每周至少会推荐两个优秀的项目和框架当然节假日除外），公众号推文中有项目和框架的详细介绍、功能特点、使用方式以及部分功能截图等（打不开或者打开GitHub很慢的同学可以优先查看公众号推文，文末一定会附带项目和框架源码地址）。注意：排名不分先后，都是十分优秀的开源项目和框架，每周定期更新分享（欢迎关注公众号：<strong>追逐时光者</strong><span>，第一时间获取每周精选分享资讯🔔）。</span></span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong><span>💡简报Gitee开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectMonthly.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/ysgdaydayup/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectMonthly.md</span></a></span></span></strong></li>
<li><strong><span>🔔简报GitHub开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectMonthly.md" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/docs/DotNet/DotNetProjectMonthly.md</span></a></span></span></strong></li>
<li><strong>👪DotNetGuide技术社区交流8群：</strong><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&nbsp;<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247508804&amp;idx=2&amp;sn=5bffb84644b6475a5afaf5e655f3817d&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/6H2-x-Von_s-04-c2CtSHg</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247511000&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=95a590f63dc27f714c1d6748c2c70dc0&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">🎯互联网寒冬下，如何写好一份.NET求职简历？附带简洁简历模板和简历优化服务来了！！！</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>eShop</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;eShop是一款由.NET官方开源的，基于.NET Aspire构建的用于参考学习的服务架构电子商务系统，旨在展示如何利用.NET框架及其相关技术栈构建一个现代化的电子商务网站。该项目采用服务架构，将应用程序分解为多个独立的服务，每个服务都可以独立开发、部署和扩展。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/dotnet/eShop" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/dotnet/eShop</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247509903&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=c99c97360ea24a45270b8e476f9f0327&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/ufxiFkdNbW6UaufvlHE2FQ</span></a></span></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250308013506448-404517710.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250308013510977-1005539414.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Bulk Crap Uninstaller</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;Bulk Crap Uninstaller 是一款基于 .NET 开源（Apache License）、免费、功能强大的Windows应用卸载工具，旨在帮助用户快速且有效地移除系统中不再需要的大量应用程序。支持批量和强制卸载、清理残留文件、检测隐藏或受保护的已注册应用等功能。虽然面向 IT 专业人员设计，但其简单的默认设置，让任何人都能轻松上手。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/Klocman/Bulk-Crap-Uninstaller" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/Klocman/Bulk-Crap-Uninstaller</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247509902&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=2f1a600ba3637305d2a551caa9db530f&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/jZCDMcjnpj-_N52jxHgxKw</span></a></span></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250308013525773-341690177.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250308013529971-1097968686.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Netnr.Login</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;Netnr.Login是一个基于 C# 开源（MIT License）的第三方 OAuth2 授权登录整合库，集成了QQ、微信开放平台（<span>Weixin）、微信公众平台（WeixinMP）、微博（Weibo）、淘宝（Taobao）、支付宝（Alipay）、钉钉（DingTalk）、飞书（Feishu）、华为（Huawei）、小米（Xiaomi）、AtomGit、码云（<span>Gitee）、GitHub、GitLab、微软（Microsoft ）、StackOverflow等授权登录功能，可以帮助大家快速完成常见的第三方平台的登录授权功能。</span></span></span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/netnr/Netnr.Login" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/netnr/Netnr.Login</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247509904&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=2cb7332b0a00e005f988e94b82f9875d&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/XT8WeRxa-_qmrOAs8odj5w</span></a></span></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250308013545231-735514438.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>BYSerial</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;BYSerial是一款基于 WPF 开源（MIT License）、免费、功能全面的串口调试工具，支持中英文双语切换，具有通用串口调试工具的一般功能，如串口通讯调试、TCP通讯调试、支持串口接收数据曲线显示等。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/LvYiWuHen/byserial" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/LvYiWuHen/byserial</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247509905&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=31dd11ca76b549ca5e191da34903b252&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/cAb5GExmhU0_6mw-M3iHRA</span></a></span></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250308013557887-193159790.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250308013602016-820601890.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>V-Control</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;V-Control 是一个适用于 .NET MAUI 的开源(MIT license)、免费的 UI 组件库，它提供了一组开箱即用的 UI 控件，可快速搭建面向业务的应用程序界面。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/jevonsflash/V-Control" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/jevonsflash/V-Control</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510404&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=5ba3c3854a127410c5c6001e8acfde8b&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/zN_56i4C9Uhj_oJQWl0f5Q</span></a></span></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250308013614463-650117250.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Plotly.NET</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;Plotly.NET 一个为 .NET 打造的强大、免费、开源的交互式图表库，支持 C# 和 F#编程语言，它构建在 plotly.js 之上并提供多个 API 层，用于创建、样式化和渲染美观的数据可视化图表。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/plotly/Plotly.NET" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/plotly/Plotly.NET</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510701&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=27c35ec2d75142f60d3135d6e15ec653&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/YBZ1ta70YPeUq4JTkMq9aw</span></a></span></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250308013632508-1281758242.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>NetPad</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;NetPad是一个基于.NET开源（MIT License）、跨平台的C#编辑器和游乐场，它允许用户立即运行C#代码，无需创建和管理项目。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/tareqimbasher/NetPad" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/tareqimbasher/NetPad</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510760&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=808db3a6be3a95af0d170f4f0d1fe03d&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/DVv_5LdMBTam4Ro-k9f-Ow</span></a></span></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250308013657644-136989327.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>WinformDevFramework</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;WinformDevFramework是一个基于C# Winform开源免费（GPL-2.0开源协议）的通用快速开发框架，内置完整的权限架构，功能包括：菜单、角色、用户、字典、日志、代码生成等一系列系统常规模块。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/wkjerry_admin/WinformGeneralDeveloperFrame" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/wkjerry_admin/WinformGeneralDeveloperFrame</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510784&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=eeafca3baf21d28a059867785b471838&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/Lk_HBmznE18db8czj_Lrtg</span></a></span></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250308013710868-967185055.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>MatBlazor</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;MatBlazor是一套基于 <span>Material Design 规范实现的、开源（MIT license）且免费的 Blazor 和 Razor 通用组件库。</span></span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/SamProf/MatBlazor" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/SamProf/MatBlazor</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510824&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=5b6f147d2c47b16c90a1c426ed17452c&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/mFSAX81f7jsB3D1mL3XzPg</span></a></span></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250308013723896-700119336.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250308013728453-1022092690.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>Cofoundry</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;Cofoundry是一个开源且免费的 .NET CMS 和应用程序框架，专注于代码优先的开发模式、无侵入的集成方式、可扩展且灵活的架构以及简单且用户友好的内容管理。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/cofoundry-cms/cofoundry" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/cofoundry-cms/cofoundry</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510865&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=fca7db87b28a26706045a2d11d60da61&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/FeiRaHcry9TY4Gz658YtoQ</span></a></span></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250308013743619-2121321230.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250308013749279-33490999.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>mom</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>项目简介：</strong><span>&nbsp;tmom是一款基于 .NET 开源、通用的生产制造系统，支持多厂区/多项目级的MOM/MES系统，计划排程、工艺路线设计、在线低代码报表、大屏看板、移动端、AOT客户端...... 目标是尽可能打造一款通用的生产制造系统。前端基于最新的vue3、ts、ant design vue, 后端使用.net8、Sqlsugar，支持多种数据库切换、数据隔离与聚合。</span></li>
<li><strong>项目源码地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://gitee.com/thgao/tmom" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://gitee.com/thgao/tmom</span></a></span></li>
<li><strong>项目详细介绍：</strong><span>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510880&amp;idx=2&amp;sn=7ddb724d5c5b620bbfc4825bef05ecb0&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/KOxtnNRUngeaSb5vZ86Z-Q</span></a></span></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250308013803591-1620187031.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202503/1336199-20250308013807582-1359538345.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<div id="gtx-trans" style="position: absolute; left: 139px; top: 12667.6px">&nbsp;</div>
</div>
<div id="MySignature" role="contentinfo">
    <blockquote>
<p style="font-family:YouYuan;font-size: 16px;margin: 0 auto 0.01em auto;"><span style="font-size: 17px; ">作者名称：</span><a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/" target="_blank">追逐时光者</a></p>
<p style="font-family:YouYuan;font-size: 16px;margin: 0 auto 0.01em auto;"><span style="font-size: 17px; ">作者简介：</span>一个热爱编程、善于分享、喜欢学习、探索、尝试新事物和新技术的全栈软件工程师。</p>
<p style="font-family:YouYuan;font-size: 16px;margin: 0 auto 0.01em auto;">
本文版权归作者和博客园共有，欢迎转载，但未经作者同意必须保留此段声明，且在文章页面明显位置给出原文链接，否则保留追究法律责任的权利。如果该篇文章对您有帮助的话，可以点一下右下角的<a onclick="votePost(cb_entryId,'Digg')" href="javascript:void(0)" style="color:red;">【♥推荐♥】</a>，希望能够持续的为大家带来好的技术文章，文中可能存在描述不正确的地方，欢迎指正或补充，不胜感激。
</p>
</blockquote>
</div>
